meanings.definition: The act of making something active or operative.
meanings.sent1: The activation of the alarm alerted everyone in the building.
meanings.sent2: The activation of the new software improved the efficiency of the system.
meanings.sent3: The activation of the sprinklers surprised the office workers on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The activation of the volcano brought chaos to the island.
meanings.sent5: The sudden activation of the robot startled the children at the science fair.

meanings.definition: The process of starting or turning on something.
meanings.sent1: The activation of the car engine signaled the beginning of the road trip.
meanings.sent2: The activation of the security system was necessary before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: The activation of the blender created a whirlwind of ingredients in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The activation of the streetlights brightened up the dark neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The activation of the sprinkler system saved the garden from wilting in the heat.

meanings.definition: The state of being active or in operation.
meanings.sent1: The activation of the machine indicated it was ready for use.
meanings.sent2: The activation of the organization's plan led to successful outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The activation of the cat's curiosity resulted in a toppled vase.
meanings.sent4: The activation of the market brought a buzz of activity to the street.
meanings.sent5: The activation of the athlete's energy propelled them to victory.
